parameters.name: DashboardId
parameters.description: The name or ARN for the dashboard.

nested_items.name: DashboardArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the dashboard.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of dashboard.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the dashboard.

nested_items.name: Widgets
nested_items.description: An array of widgets for the dashboard.

nested_items.name: QueryAlias
nested_items.description: The query alias used to identify the query for the widget.

nested_items.name: QueryStatement
nested_items.description: The SQL query statement for the widget.

nested_items.name: QueryParameters
nested_items.description: The query parameters for the widget.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ViewProperties
nested_items.description: The view properties for the widget. For more information about view properties, see View properties for widgets in the CloudTrail User Guide..
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RefreshSchedule
nested_items.description: The refresh schedule for the dashboard, if configured.

nested_items.name: Frequency
nested_items.description: The frequency at which you want the dashboard refreshed.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit to use for the refresh.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the refresh schedule is enabled. Set the value to ENABLED to enable the refresh schedule, or to DISABLED to turn off the refresh schedule.

nested_items.name: TimeOfDay
nested_items.description: The time of day in UTC to run the schedule; for hourly only refer to minutes; default is 00:00.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp that shows when the dashboard was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp that shows when the dashboard was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastRefreshId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last dashboard refresh.

nested_items.name: LastRefreshFailureReason
nested_items.description: Provides information about failures for the last scheduled refresh.

nested_items.name: TerminationProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether termination protection is enabled for the dashboard.
